feed.title: Paperless-ngx Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.6.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.6.2

Features

  • Enhancement: move and rename files when storage paths deleted, update file handling docs @shamoon (#6033)
  • Enhancement: better detection of default currency code @shamoon (#6020)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: make document counts in object lists permissions-aware @shamoon (#6019)

All App Changes

3 changes - Enhancement: move and rename files when storage paths deleted, update file handling docs @shamoon ([#6033](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6033)) - Fix: make document counts in object lists permissions-aware @shamoon ([#6019](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6019)) - Enhancement: better detection of default currency code @shamoon ([#6020](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6020))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.6.3
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.6.3

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: allow setting allauth ACCOUNT_SESSION_REMEMBER @shamoon (#6105)
  • Change: dont require empty bulk edit parameters @shamoon (#6059)

Dependencies

4 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6120](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6120)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#6079](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6079)) - Chore(deps): Bump the django group with 1 update @dependabot ([#6080](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6080)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6081](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6081))

All App Changes

8 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump follow-redirects from 1.15.5 to 1.15.6 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6120](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6120)) - Fix: allow setting allauth `ACCOUNT_SESSION_REMEMBER` @shamoon ([#6105](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6105)) - Change: remove credentials from redis url in system status @shamoon ([#6104](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6104)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 3 updates @dependabot ([#6079](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6079)) - Chore(deps): Bump the django group with 1 update @dependabot ([#6080](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6080)) - Chore(deps): Bump the small-changes group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6081](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6081)) - Change: dont require empty bulk edit parameters @shamoon ([#6059](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6059)) - Fix: missing translation string @DimitriDR ([#6054](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6054))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.7.0
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.7.0

Notable Changes

  • Feature: PDF actions - merge, split \& rotate @shamoon (#6094)
  • Change: enable auditlog by default, fix import / export @shamoon (#6267)

Enhancements

  • Enhancement: always place search term first in autocomplete results @shamoon (#6142)

Maintenance

  • Chore: Standardize subprocess running and logging @stumpylog (#6275)

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Escape the secret key when writing it to the env file @stumpylog (#6243)
  • Fix: Hide sidebar labels if group is empty @shamoon (#6254)
  • Fix: management list clear all should clear header checkbox @shamoon (#6253)
  • Fix: start-align object names in some UI lists @shamoon (#6188)
  • Fix: allow scroll long upload files alerts list @shamoon (#6184)
  • Fix: document_renamer fails with audit_log enabled @shamoon (#6175)
  • Fix: catch sessionStorage errors for large documents @shamoon (#6150)

Documentation

  • Change: enable auditlog by default, fix import / export @shamoon (#6267)
  • Enhancement: support custom fields in post_document endpoint @shamoon (#6222)

Dependencies

9 changes - Chore(deps): Bump pillow from 10.2.0 to 10.3.0 @dependabot ([#6268](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6268)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6276](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6276)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 17 updates @dependabot ([#6248](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6248)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.42.0 to 1.42.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6250](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6250)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 20.11.24 to 20.12.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6251](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6251)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6249](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6249)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump express from 4.18.3 to 4.19.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6207](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6207)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump webpack-dev-middleware from 5.3.3 to 5.3.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6161](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6161)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 4 updates @dependabot ([#6131](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6131))

All App Changes

20 changes - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6276](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6276)) - Chore: Standardize subprocess running and logging @stumpylog ([#6275](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6275)) - Change: enable auditlog by default, fix import / export @shamoon ([#6267](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6267)) - Fix: Hide sidebar labels if group is empty @shamoon ([#6254](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6254)) - Fix: management list clear all should clear header checkbox @shamoon ([#6253](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6253)) - Chore(deps): Bump the frontend-angular-dependencies group in /src-ui with 17 updates @dependabot ([#6248](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6248)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @playwright/test from 1.42.0 to 1.42.1 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6250](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6250)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump @types/node from 20.11.24 to 20.12.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6251](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6251)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the frontend-eslint-dependencies group in /src-ui with 2 updates @dependabot ([#6249](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6249)) - Enhancement: support custom fields in post\_document endpoint @shamoon ([#6222](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6222)) - Enhancement: add ASN to consume rejection message @eliasp ([#6217](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6217)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump express from 4.18.3 to 4.19.2 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6207](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6207)) - Feature: PDF actions - merge, split \& rotate @shamoon ([#6094](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6094)) - Fix: start-align object names in some UI lists @shamoon ([#6188](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6188)) - Fix: allow scroll long upload files alerts list @shamoon ([#6184](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6184)) - Fix: document\_renamer fails with audit\_log enabled @shamoon ([#6175](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6175)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump webpack-dev-middleware from 5.3.3 to 5.3.4 in /src-ui @dependabot ([#6161](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6161)) - Enhancement: always place search term first in autocomplete results @shamoon ([#6142](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6142)) - Fix: catch sessionStorage errors for large documents @shamoon ([#6150](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6150)) - Chore(deps-dev): Bump the development group with 4 updates @dependabot ([#6131](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6131))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.7.1
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.7.1

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: Only disable split button if pages = 1 @shamoon (#6304)
  • Fix: Use correct custom field id when splitting @shamoon (#6303)
  • Fix: Rotation fails due to celery chord @stumpylog (#6306)
  • Fix: split user / group objects error @shamoon (#6302)

All App Changes

4 changes - Fix: Only disable split button if pages = 1 @shamoon ([#6304](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6304)) - Fix: Use correct custom field id when splitting @shamoon ([#6303](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6303)) - Fix: Rotation fails due to celery chord @stumpylog ([#6306](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6306)) - Fix: split user / group objects error @shamoon ([#6302](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6302))

entry.title: New release for Paperless-ngx: Paperless-ngx v2.7.2
entry.content:
paperless-ngx 2.7.2

Bug Fixes

  • Fix: select dropdown background colors not visible in light mode @shamoon (#6323)
  • Fix: spacing in reset and incorrect display in saved views @shamoon (#6324)
  • Fix: disable invalid create endpoints @shamoon (#6320)
  • Fix: dont initialize page numbers, allow split with browser pdf viewer @shamoon (#6314)
  • Miscellaneous other fixes & improvements

All App Changes

4 changes - Fix: select dropdown background colors not visible in light mode @shamoon ([#6323](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6323)) - Fix: spacing in reset and incorrect display in saved views @shamoon ([#6324](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6324)) - Fix: disable invalid create endpoints @shamoon ([#6320](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6320)) - Fix: dont initialize page numbers, allow split with browser pdf viewer @shamoon ([#6314](https://github.com/paperless-ngx/paperless-ngx/pull/6314))
